title: LeaverBuster Glitch

replies.body: Weeeeell that's not supposed to happen O_O. Looks like you didn't have too many games left to play through, but it does seem like that counter reset for some reason. Check your account again and let me know if those LPQ's finally fell off or not!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hbusaLAT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-07T01:52:56.064+0000)
>
> Weeeeell that's not supposed to happen O_O. Looks like you didn't have too many games left to play through, but it does seem like that counter reset for some reason. Check your account again and let me know if those LPQ's finally fell off or not!

Went away :)
